Articles.Content:
Hello kerbal community. In this thread, I'll be posting my missions in the Kerbal universe. Throughout my missions I will be using stock parts and procedural fearing, one of my favorite mods. All other mods will be listed with the mission report.

Please post replies on your opinions and tips.

Mission 1:

Goal:

  • Put a small habitable space station in an orbit around the Mun.
  • Land a Munar module and return to Kerban

Edited July 26, 2013 by DesertWolf

Mission 1:

Goal:

  • Put a small habitable space station in an orbit around the Mun.
  • Land a Munar module and return to Kerban

Launch craft: Prometheus I

Prometheus I is a heavy lifting recoverable launch vehicle capable of inserting 55 tons into 100x100 orbit around Kerban. Based off the Falcon 9 heavy.

  • Boosters: 8 LV-T30, 10 LV-T45
  • First stage: 4 LV-T30, 5 LV-T45

Cargo:

  • Transfeer vehicle: Zebalah Space Station: 1 LV-T30
  • Phoenix Lander: 4 LV-909

Mission Picture log:

Launch of "Prometheus I" carrying Zebalah Space Station and the Phoenix LAnder.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Deorbiting of the first stage.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Transfeer to Munar orbit.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Landing of the Phoenix.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Zebalah Space Station:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Mission results:

Successfully inserted Zebalah space station into Munar orbit.

Successfully landed Phoenix onto the Mun.

Failed to take off of the Mun due to Lander fuel being used by the Munar transfer vehicle.

Edited July 27, 2013 by DesertWolf
